description: A left ventricular assist device (LVAD) is a mechanical pump that is used to support the function of the left ventricle of the heart.

attributes.name: Presence of LVAD
attributes.description: Indicates whether an LVAD is present or absent

attributes.name: Appropriate position
attributes.description: Indicates whether the LVAD is in an appropriate position

values.name: Yes
values.description: LVAD is in an appropriate position

values.name: No
values.description: LVAD is not in an appropriate position

attributes.name: Location
attributes.description: Indicates the location of the LVAD

values.name: Intracorporeal
values.description: LVAD is located within the body

values.name: Extracorporeal
values.description: LVAD is located outside the body

attributes.name: Outflow Conduit Location
attributes.description: Indicates the location of the outflow conduit of the LVAD

values.name: Ascending aorta
values.description: Outflow conduit is connected to the ascending aorta

values.name: Descending aorta
values.description: Outflow conduit is connected to the descending aorta
